full_description:
Xiaomi Mi A Pro 32 Inch Smart Android HD Google TV (Global Version)

The Xiaomi Mi A Pro 32 Inch Smart Android HD Google Television Global Version, with its outstanding features and cutting-edge technology, completely transforms the home entertainment experience. The television has a brilliant HD display with a resolution of 1366 x 768 pixels and a smooth 60 Hz refresh rate, providing breathtaking graphics and fluid motion for an immersive watching experience. This Smart TV goes beyond typical capabilities by incorporating Google Assistant right into the system, giving customers a hands-free and straightforward method to operate their TV, search for content, and access a variety of smart features. The addition of Chromecast improves connection by allowing consumers to easily stream content from compatible devices to their TV screens. The audio experience is similarly impressive, owing to the two speakers that generate a strong 10W output, assuring crisp and rich sound quality. Whether you're watching your favorite shows, accessing a plethora of Android apps, or seamlessly casting content from your devices, the Xiaomi Mi A Pro Smart Android HD Google Television stands out as a versatile and sophisticated entertainment hub that brings the future of home viewing to your living room.

High-resolution Display

The ultra-narrow bezel design of Xiaomi Mi A Pro TV allows for a far higher screen-to-body ratio than normal TVs. When you switch on the TV, high-resolution visuals in brilliant colors cover the screen, creating an immersive experience.

Immersive Audio

Dolby Audio + DTS-X dual decoding technology creates vibrant sound effects for a more immersive listening experience. Furthermore, the DTS Virtual:X technology of Xiaomi Mi A Pro delivers three-dimensional sound with an overhead dimension, simulating the movie experience.

Entertainment With Google

Google TV aggregates movies, programs, and other content from your applications and subscriptions for personalized viewing. Discover new things with Mi A Pro TV to watch with suggestions based on what you've seen and what interests you from your subscriptions and accessible content.

title: Xiaomi Mi Q2 55 Inch QLED 4K UHD Smart Google TV (Global Version)
cat_seo_title: XIAOMI MI Television Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy XIAOMI MI Television at best price in Bangladesh. Find latest XIAOMI MI TV at lowest price in Star Tech. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
full_description:
Xiaomi Mi Q2 55 Inch QLED 4K UHD Smart Google TV (Global Version)

The Xiaomi Mi Q2 55 Inch Smart Google TV is the ultimate of home entertainment. This television redefines visual quality with its enormous 55-inch QLED 4K UHD display and quantum dot technology. Every image comes to life with vividness and realism because to its exceptional color performance and capacity to produce an astounding 1.07 billion colors. With 92% DCI-P3 coverage, you may enjoy cinematic color integrity. This Xiaomi Mi Q2 55" TV provides fluid, responsive performance, readily performing demanding activities, thanks to the MTK 9611 chipset with a Quad A55 CPU. With 2GB of RAM and 16GB of internal storage, you can expect fast app loading and enough of room for your favorite stuff. The combination of Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos technology improves your audio-visual experience even more. Dolby Vision IQ adjusts the display to the surrounding lighting and content, delivering consistent brightness, contrast, and color. Dolby Atmos creates a fantastic audio experience. The Xiaomi Mi Q2 55" smart TV with MEMC technology intelligently enhances low frame rate video for crisper and fluid motion, resulting in better graphics during fast-paced sequences. Google TV integration puts a world of entertainment at your fingertips by combining content from numerous applications and subscriptions based on your interests. Content discovery is simplified with personalized suggestions based on your watching habits. With a simple "Ok Google" or the dedicated remote button, you can search movies, stream applications, play music, and operate smart home devices with integrated Google Assistant. With a range of up to 10 meters and shortcut buttons for rapid access to your favored content, the 360° Bluetooth remote control provides ease. The Xiaomi Mi Q2 55-inch TV's sleek appearance, which includes a sandblasted aluminum frame, unibody back panel, and an attractive load-balancing metal base, complements its remarkable capabilities. The built-in Chromecast and Miracast capabilities allow you to easily cast movies, programs, and images from your mobile devices to the TV. With a variety of interfaces and wired network connectors, this TV can support a variety of devices and connectivity requirements.

Xiaomi Warranty Card must be kept for warranty claims.

product_page_short_description: Processor: MediaTek MT9617, CPU: Quad A73
full_description:
Xiaomi Max 86" 4K UltraHD Android Smart LED TV (Global Version)

The Xiaomi Max 86" 4K UltraHD Android Smart LED TV (Global Version) is a high-end television designed to provide an immersive viewing experience. With its massive 86-inch 4K UHD display, it delivers stunning picture quality with a resolution of 3,840 x 2,160 pixels. The TV supports various HDR formats, including Dolby Vision IQ, HDR10+, and HLG, allowing for vibrant colors, enhanced contrast, and a wider dynamic range. Powered by a MediaTek MT9617 processor with a Quad A73 CPU, the TV ensures smooth performance and efficient multitasking. It comes with 3GB of RAM and offers 32GB of storage capacity, providing ample space to install apps and store media files. The Xiaomi Max 86" TV supports Dolby Atmos and DTS:X, delivering immersive and realistic audio. With its 15W + 15W speaker configuration, it produces clear and powerful sound output. Running on the Android TV 11 operating system, the TV offers a user-friendly interface and access to a wide range of apps and streaming services through the Google Play Store. It also supports voice control and comes with a remote control that includes a built-in microphone for convenient voice commands. The TV has a color gamut of DCI-P3 90% (typ), ensuring rich and accurate colors. It supports a color depth of 1.07 billion colors using an 8-bit + FRC (Frame Rate Control) mechanism, which helps achieve smoother gradations and reduced color banding. With a refresh rate of 120Hz, the TV delivers smooth motion and reduces motion blur, making it ideal for watching fast-paced content such as sports and action movies. The Xiaomi Max 86" 4K UltraHD Android Smart LED TV offers a premium viewing experience with its large display, impressive picture quality, immersive audio, and advanced features, making it a compelling choice for those seeking a high-end home entertainment setup.
